system.weapons: None, but can be modified to mount any Heavy weapon of less than 40kg (Manned by Co-Pilot).
system.specialRules:
The Vehicle Hovers above the ground, ignoring hampering terrain. If it would be immobilised due to damage, it is instead destroyed as it crashes into the ground.

This Vehicle is open-topped, enemies may target the crew and passengers of the vehicle by using a Called Shot Action.
